title: Stepped Approach :- For stepped approach size of tread shall not be less than 300 mm
clause_text: Stepped Approach :- For stepped approach size of tread shall not be less than 300 mm. and maximum riser shall be 150 mm. Provision of 800 mm. high hand rail on both sides of the stepped approach similar to the ramped approach.
